subject: Investing
title: US Treasury Bonds
description: A micro-lesson that makes US Treasury Bonds usable.

hook.text: US Treasuries are backed by the full faith of the US government. They're considered the safest investment on Earth.

buildup.text: T-bills mature in under a year. T-notes in 2 to 10 years. T-bonds in 20 to 30 years. Same guarantee.

discovery.text: Treasuries set the baseline for all other rates. Corporate and mortgage rates are priced as a spread above them.

twist.text: Safe doesn't mean profitable. In 2022, long-term Treasuries lost over 30% as rates surged.

climax.text: Foreign governments hold $7 trillion in US Treasuries. Japan and China are the largest holders.

punchline.text: Treasuries are the world's safe haven. Even safe havens have bad years.

quiz.question: What sets US Treasury bonds apart from corporate bonds?
options: They're backed by the US government and considered risk-free
